Title:

-Special characters for manager

no error message is displayed

Error message indicating
 not allowed special characters

Title:
Verify that amount can not 
accept minus or zero  for manager
Summary:
add zero and minus 
numbers in field of amount
precondition:
1-Connect with internet
2-open browser 
3-open guru page
4-login as manager
5-should have vaild accounts
Steps:
"
1-login as customer
2-press on mini Customized
Statment
3-enter account no
4-enter valid date interval 
5-enter amount zero or minus number"

Title:
Verify that Manager can display his customized
statment  for manager
Summary:
when we submit the button
we can not go to page of statments
precondition:
1-Connect with internet
2-open browser 
3-open guru page
4-login as manager
5-should have vaild accounts
Steps:
1-login as manager
2-press on mini Customized
Statment
3-enter account no
4-enter valid date interval 
5-enter valid amount
expected result:
no message error and manager 
can search on any account no 
associate with him
Actual Result:
No Error message is displayed 
and can not go to statment page
